author: Warhammer
description:
The Chaos Knights are stomping their way across the battlefields of Warhammer 40,000 next weekend with a new Codex, Battleforce, and towering miniature.

A pair of Star Players take to the pitch for Blood Bowl, and the Oathmaker pledges to serve Saruman in Middle-earth™.

You can also settle down to read a trio of Black Library releases, watch new episodes of Loremasters and Citadel Colour Masterclass, and discover the secrets of writing army lists in the new show Victory Pointers on Warhammer TV.

https://www.warhammer-community.com/en-gb/articles/yvrlx5af/sunday-preview-chaos-knights-crush-the-competition/

title: This Week in Warhammer – Chaos Knights crush the competition
